alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 4:20AM CST until December 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations ranging anywhere from 3 to 6 inches possible. Snow may be preceded by a brief period of freezing drizzle. Strong northwesterly winds may gust up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Yuma County in Colorado and Dundy County in Nebraska. * WHEN...Late Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions associated with heavy snow, blowing snow, and strong northwesterly winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions possible, especially across Yuma county.
info.instruction: Monitor the forecast for further updates and possible warnings. Consider alternate travel plans.
